author: hwright
msg: Add an option to svnserve to force it into single-threaded mode.  This
greatly simplifies debugging an svnserve server.

author: atm
msg: HDFS-3039. Address findbugs and javadoc warnings on branch. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: atm
msg: HDFS-3037. TestMulitipleNNDataBlockScanner#testBlockScannerAfterRestart is racy. Contributed by Aaron T. Myers.

author: kwright
msg: Internationalize the editConnection.js template.  Also fixed some problems with the connector code itself; some i18n work was lost, and in some cases 'null' checks had been replaced with StringUtils.empty(), which were incorrect and broke the UI.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed an issue in the server when we start it twice.
